long_description: No. 1 for summer fun, the girls' Roxy Double Casing Swimsuit features double back straps for twice the support. Bottoms feature ties at both sides and offer full coverage. Made from a strong and resilient nylon/spandex blend, this super swim fabric is smooth to the touch and will help protect skin from rashing. You can count on the Roxy Double Casing Swimsuit's colors to stay nice and bright, even after several seasons in the surf and sun. Hand wash in cold water.
short_description: No. 1 for summer fun, the girls' Roxy Double Casing Swimsuit features double back straps for twice the support. Bottoms feature ties at both sides and offer full coverage.
